pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

pathParameters.name: slot
pathParameters.description: Name of the deployment slot. By default, this API returns the production slot.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

pathParameters.name: name
pathParameters.description: Unique name of the app to create or update. To create or update a deployment slot, use the {slot} parameter.

pathParameters.name: slot
pathParameters.description: Name of the deployment slot to create or update. By default, this API attempts to create or modify the production slot.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

pathParameters.name: name
pathParameters.description: Name of the app to delete.

pathParameters.name: slot
pathParameters.description: Name of the deployment slot to delete. By default, the API deletes the production slot.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

queryParameters.name: deleteMetrics
queryParameters.description: If true, web app metrics are also deleted.

queryParameters.name: deleteEmptyServerFarm
queryParameters.description: Specify false if you want to keep empty App Service plan. By default, empty App Service plan is deleted.

pathParameters.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

pathParameters.name: name
pathParameters.description: Unique name of the app to create or update. To create or update a deployment slot, use the {slot} parameter.

pathParameters.name: slot
pathParameters.description: Name of the deployment slot to create or update. By default, this API attempts to create or modify the production slot.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).
